Source.Name: par2cmdline
Source.Summary: PAR file verification and repair tool
Source.Description: par2cmdline is a program for creating and using PAR2 files to detect damage in data files and repair them if necessary. It can be used with any kind of file.

Package.Name: par2cmdline
Package.Summary: PAR file verification and repair tool
Package.Description: par2cmdline is a program for creating and using PAR2 files to detect damage in data files and repair them if necessary. It can be used with any kind of file.
